FuncDef: This command assigns the low burst maximum class to associate with the Ethernet egress expanded secondary shaper.
CLIs: class <class-number> rate <rate> [ monitor-threshold <size-in-kilobytes> ] [ burst-limit <size> ] [ bytes | kilobytes ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the class identifier of the low burst max class for the shaper. Values-1 to 8.
Specifies the rate limit for the secondary shaper. Values-max, 1 to 10000000 kb/s.
Specifies the monitor threshold for the secondary shaper. Values-0 to 8190.
Specifies the burst limit size. Values-1 to 327680.
Specifies to use the size in bytes.
Specifies to use the size in kilobytes.
